name: Tyrogue
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: It is famous for its eagerness to fight and always nurses injuries from challenging larger foes.

poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Hitmonlee, Hitmonchan, or Hitmontop from your hand onto Tyrogue (this counts as evolving Tyrogue) and remove all damage counters from Tyrogue.

attacks.name: Gut Blow
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage and Tyrogue does 10 damage to itself.
